alert.note: Alert for Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 30 at 10:53PM AKST until February 01 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...SNOW FOR THE NORTHERN PANHANDLE... .Moist southerly flow will override cool outflow winds in the north bringing snow Wednesday into Thursday afternoon. Expect snow to begin late Wednesday morning, with the heaviest rates expected overnight into Thursday morning. If outflow winds are not as persistent, we could see a rain/snow mix for Juneau and Icy Strait, severely impacting snow totals. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM WEDNESDAY TO 3 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 6 inches. * WHERE...Glacier Bay and Eastern Chichagof Island. * WHEN...From 3 PM Wednesday to 3 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Heaviest snowfall rates will be between 3 pm Wed and 9 pm Wed.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. People are urged to prepare their property before the onset of winter weather. For the latest road conditions, where available, call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
